metalign

Class Runner

  • java.lang.Object
    • metalign.Runner

  • public class Runner
extends java.lang.Object
    The Runner class is the interface which runs all of the different parts of the beattracking project directly. This is used as an interface between Main, which interprets the command line arguments, and the actual functionality of this project.
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 3 Sept, 2015

    • Method Detail

      • parseFile

        public static EventParser parseFile(java.io.File file,
                                    NoteEventParser parser,
                                    TimeTracker tt,
                                    boolean useChannel)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException,
                                    java.lang.InterruptedException
        Parse the given file with the given objects. Use this method if you don't know specifically whether the file is a **kern file or a MIDI file, but if it is a MIDI file, you know whether to use channels or tracks as the gold standard voices.
        This method first tries to detect the file's type by its extension (.mid, .midi, or .krn). If the extension is something else, or there is some error parsing the file, both MIDI and **kern are tried to see if either works.
        If you know the file type already, you should use either parseKernFile(File, NoteEventParser, TimeTracker) (for **kern files) or parseMidiFile(File, NoteEventParser, TimeTracker, boolean) (for MIDI files).
        Parameters:
        file - The file to parse.
        parser - The NoteEventParser to pass note events to.
        tt - The TimeTracker to pass time events to.
        Returns:
        The EventParser used to parse the given file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - The File was unable to be parsed for some reason.
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - The File contained invalid MIDI data.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - An interrupt occurred in GUI mode.

      • parseMidiFile

        public static MidiEventParser parseMidiFile(java.io.File file,
                                            NoteEventParser parser,
                                            TimeTracker tt,
                                            boolean useChannel)
                                     throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException,
                                            java.io.IOException,
                                            java.lang.InterruptedException
        Parse the given MIDI file using the given objects.
        Parameters:
        file - The MIDI File we wish to parse.
        parser - The NoteEventParser we want our EventParser to pass note events to.
        tt - The TimeTracker we want our EventParser to pass time events to.
        useChannel - Whether we want to use channels as a gold standard voice (TRUE), or tracks (FALSE), when parsing midi.
        Returns:
        The MidiEventParser to be used for this song.
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - If the File contains invalid MIDI data.
        java.io.IOException - If there was an error reading the File.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - An interrupt occurred in GUI mode.

      • parseKernFile

        public static KernEventParser parseKernFile(java.io.File file,
                                            NoteEventParser parser,
                                            TimeTracker tt)
                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                            java.lang.InterruptedException
        Parse the given **kern file using the given objects.
        Parameters:
        file - The **kern File we wish to parse.
        parser - The NoteEventParser we want our EventParser to pass note events to.
        tt - The TimeTracker we want our EventParser to pass time events to.
        Returns:
        The KernEventParser to be used for this song.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there was some error reading or parsing the file.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - An interrupt occurred in GUI mode.

      • performInference

        public static void performInference(MidiModel model,
                                    NoteListGenerator nlg)
        Perform inference on the given model.
        Parameters:
        model - The model on which we want to perform inference.
        nlg - The NoteListGenerator which will give us the incoming note lists.
